subject: Inquiry – European Power Cable & SimJack Compatibility for VAM Pro Set
description_text:
Hello,



I am interested in purchasing the VAM Pro Set (3 haptic reactors) from your website.

However, I noticed that the included power supply appears to have a plug that is not compatible with European (French) outlets.



Could you please confirm:



If you offer a European version (EU/FR plug) of the power supply, or if it can be purchased separately?
Whether the VAM haptic motors are compatible with the SimJack pedals, or if a special configuration is required to make them work together.




Thank you in advance for your help and reply.

Best regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi jules français,    We will provide the appropriate plug for your country. You can purchase the power supply separately, and we will also include the plug. Haptics can be used with other pedals; simply use our control box.
Hi jules français,    Link to purchase the power supply separately  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351007297850
